metadata.title: CVE-2021-28658 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In Django 2.2 before 2.2.20, 3.0 before 3.0.14, and 3.1 before 3.1.8, MultiPartParser allowed directory traversal via uploaded files with suitably crafted file names. Built-in upload handlers were not affected by this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: python-django package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.19-1ubuntu1').
